Cities of Serberistan

The 7 Grand Cities

  • Paterdoma
  • Vantocar
  • Surniam
  • Iliamna
  • Alakan
  • Elsamera
  • Dragnara.

Surrounding these 7 cities are smaller villages and towns, many lay empty since the fall of the 3rd age. Some still maintain a permanent population, while others serve as a shelter for the traveling Sansuvut Nomads. These cities typically lay a day or two's walk from each other, lending travelers a place to rest safely as they make their pilgrimages across Serberistan.
